summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via a new AdminEmailMismatchBanner and conditional logic in App.tsx/DashboardLayout to show a persistent warning when the saved profile email is not exactly the bootstrap admin email. REQ-2 is partially implemented in ProfileSetupDialog, but the email comparison uses trimming, which violates the requirement/constraint to keep the comparison exact with no normalization changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: In ProfileSetupDialog, determine mismatch using an exact, case-sensitive comparison to "sanjeev.vohra@gmail.com" with no normalization/casing changes in the UX logic.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff uses `email.trim()` for both `isAdminEmail` and `showEmailHint` gating, which changes the comparison semantics and violates the stated constraint of no normalization changes.
evidence: frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx (uses `const isAdminEmail = email.trim() === ADMIN_EMAIL;` and `const showEmailHint = email.trim() !== '';`)
